product_name: Lowa Cevedale Pro GTX Mountaineering Boots - Men's
long_description: The Lowa Cevedale Pro GTX mountaineering boots are built to ascend, thanks to burly, waterproof construction and a lightweight, flexible and stable feel. Tough enough for technical ascents, the split leather, synthetic microfiber and Cordura(R) nylon uppers are lightweight and flexible; rubber randing helps protects uppers. Seam-sealed Gore-Tex(R) liners with wicking polyester linings deliver complete protection and allow moisture vapor to escape. Boot design facilitates ankle flex and natural movement in the uppers and maintains a stable platform underfoot; tongue stud improves lacing pressure distribution. Durable, shock-absorbent polyurethane midsoles feature thermopastic urethane inserts for additional support. Rigid, full-length nylon shanks control flex and add the stability needed during use on rough terrain and with crampons. Vibram(R) Dolent outsoles on the Lowa Cevedale Pro GTX mountaineering boots offer excellent grip, stability and durability for alpine adventures.
short_description: The Lowa Cevedale Pro GTX mountaineering boots are built to ascend, thanks to burly, waterproof construction and a lightweight, flexible and stable feel.
